title.value: Design  of triple inactivated vaccine 'TRIVAK' against rabies, distemper and parvovirus enteritis of carnivorous animals
Разработка трехвалентной инактивированной вакцины 'ТРИВАК' против бешенства, чумы и парвовирусного энтерита плотоядных животных

journal.title: Epizootiology, Immunobiology, Pharmacology, Sanitary Science : international scientific and practical journal

person.name: Krasochko, P.A., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center of Animal Breding (Belarus). The S.N. Vyshelesskij Inst. of Experimental Veterinary Medicine
Butko,L.V., Belarusian State Medical Univ. , Minsk (Belarus)

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there was developed a triple liquid tissue culture inactivated sorb vaccine against rabies, parvoviral enteritis. Cultural, liquid, inactivated, adjuvant vaccine against rabies, canine parvovirus enteritis and carnivores distemper 'TRIVAK', which consist equal volume of rabies antigen, strain KMIEV-94, virus of CPV enteritis, strain KMIEV-14b, distemper antigen, and strain KMIEV-12B. For inactivation of viruses used - teotropin 0,15% concentration and adjuvant 6% hydroxsal 10 vol. %. This vaccine is safety, sterile, high immunogenic drag for carnivorous. After double immunization dogs and rabbits had а antibody titer 7,0+/-1,0; against rabies 8,0+/-1,0 log2 against CPV and against CDV 5,0+/-1,0 log2. The commercial vaccine 'MULТICAN 8' have had practice same antibody titer. All immunization animals do not become illness after inoculation control rabies virus. This vaccine have had successfully commission test and can have recommendation for practical use.
